Reminiscent of CS source, CSGO tends to mix the old with the new. I enjoy to play this game but often the gameplay gets repetitive and boring. However, the developers are well involved with the game and usually update or introduce new concepts. Mods make this game substantially better with game modes that tend to drift away from the base game modes, such as zombie survival, minigames, and jailbreak. To be honest, I suck at this game and every time I'm in a casual and ranked match toxic players will follow, but I find the most enjoyable thing to do is play with friends and have fun regardless of your skill level.

The amount of cheaters in this game is beyond reasonable amount. Too bad the developers are too busy snorting the white stuff in order to make a proper anti-cheat system. Third party applications do a better job in banning cheaters than this game will ever do. Never start playing this game and never get into this world. If only the cheaters were gone, the game could be interesting.
